subject: PROTOCOL UPGRADE: Introducing 'workspaces/'
content: We are upgrading from '.sandbox_hybrid' to a professional 'workspaces/' structure. DEPRECATED: .sandbox, .sandbox_hybrid. NEW STANDARD: workspaces/active/<TASK_ID>/docs/. Read 'docs/specs/STABILIZATION_PROTOCOL.md' (v2.0) for details. Please adopt this structure immediately.
